title: Panel, 19th century
medium:
Medium: silk, metallic thread, paillettes
Technique: embroidered on satin weave
dimensions: H x W: 66 x 24 cm (26 in. x 9 7/16 in.)
creditline: Gift of Virginia L. Hunt in memory of Mrs. Ridgley Hunt
description: A vertical panel with a design of conventionalized flowers and leaves with scrolling stems worked in green, pink, red, yellow and blue with gilt cord and paillettes.
